Name: Race
About the game: Climb aboard your vehicle and become the master of the track! Win races and customize your vehicle! Versus AI or your friends! Improve your vehicle as you go! Play on the controller or keyboard! Different circuits are waiting for you! Features: ■ Pretty decorations! ■ Customization system! ■ Different circuits! ■ Vehicle performance improvement purchases! ■ Good music! ■ View to the third and first person! ■ Partial controller support! ■ Multiplayer! (fix in an upcoming update)
